1.text: Alright, team, we’ve got a fire at a residential building.
1.name: Captain Hayes

2.text: Be prepared for electrical hazards, things could get dangerous. Stay alert and keep your wits about you.
2.name: Captain Hayes

3.text: Any questions before we get arrive?
3.name: Captain Hayes

5.text: What can you tell me about the house we’re going to?
5.name: You

6.text: The house is filled with appliances, so electrical fires are likely. Be cautious and use the CO2 extinguisher for these.
6.name: Captain Hayes

7.text: Water could make things more dangerous. Watch out for falling debris and anything that might complicate our efforts. Stay sharp.
7.name: Captain Hayes

8.text: Any more questions before we get arrive?
8.name: Captain Hayes

10.text: How should we handle the fires here?
10.name: You

11.text: In this house, you’ll encounter various electrical appliances.
11.name: Captain Hayes

12.text: Use the CO2 fire extinguisher on any electrical fires to avoid spreading them or causing electrocution.
12.name: You

13.text: Any questions before we get arrive?
13.name: Captain Hayes

20.text: Great! We’re heading to 78 Crestwood Avenue. It’s a few blocks away.
20.name: Captain Hayes

21.text: [shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]W-wait, that’s my address![/shake]
21.name: You

23.text: [shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]My daughter… My wife…[/shake] We should hurry!
23.name: You

24.text: Calm down, young man. I know it’s hard, but try to stay level-headed. We need to focus on getting there quickly.
24.name: Captain Hayes

25.text: Also, You’ll need this for any electrical fires. Water alone can spread them or cause electrocution.
25.name: Captain Hayes
